item.description:
An all-inclusive, BYOB weekend designed for your every need and desire for reconnecting with your best friend or partying into the wee hours with your Gang of Girlfriends! Enjoy a 2 night stay, all meals, live entertainment including a Comedian, DJ Jim Plunkett, Karaoke and more! Sign up for yoga, massage, reflexology, reiki, facials, belly dancing, boudoir photography, sexy cocktail class, journaling, Big Girl Bingo and much more! Sleep, read and enjoy the indoor heated tropical pool area, laugh, dance and empower yourself!

So affordable too! It's BYOB all weekend, and the prices are all-inclusive! Price includes 2 night stay, all nightly entertainment, all meals the entire weekend, all taxes and all gratuities!

Doubles - $240pp, Triples - $225pp, Quads - $205pp.

Indulge in a Single - $315pp.

Please join us for a great weekend that you won't forget -

Girls Getaway East - No Guys, No Kids, No Worries!
item.name: Girls Getaway East - Just what we need after the Holiday Rush!
